content:
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-7495-ssz-progressivecontainer/15476 this is the most thorough changelog.

content: meanwhile, the specs live in `ethereum/consensus-specs` (with thorough tests in `ethereum/consensus-spec-tests`) and a tracker on https://pureth.guide/implementations-ssz/
